## stringifySqlQuery variable

Makes an SQL query from paraeter array. Not includes parts like `SELECT * FROM data` and the trailing `;`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stringifySqlQuery: Stringifier<Parameter[]>
```
